vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (reentrancy_cross_function.sol#13-19):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (reentrancy_cross_function.sol#16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalances (reentrancy_cross_function.sol#18)
